forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. Southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
This morning in Downtown San Francisco, a gentle ballet of clouds drifts lazily overhead, casting a soft veil of light across the city. The air hums with the whisper of a light southwesterly breeze, each gust laced with the salt of the ocean. As the sun begins its ascent, it erases remnants of the night and promises a warm embrace later in the day. The anticipated high dances around a comfortable 66 degrees, inviting you to leave the heavier layers at home, while still keeping a light jacket handy for those moments when the breeze whispers a cooler tune.

Looking out, you might notice patches of fog, lingering along the horizon, evoking a sense of tranquil mystery. The Golden Gate Bridge emerges from the mist as a sentinel of the bay, a soft shadow interplaying with the rays of sunshine. Given these conditions, consider a stroll through the city’s neighborhoods or a leisurely walk along the waterfront. Grab a coffee from a local café and settle on a sun-drenched bench, allowing the day to unfold at its own pace. Enjoy the clarity of the moment as you embrace the simple pleasure of life in this vibrant city.
